dimensions.label: Decision Making Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach decision-making?

options.description: Your FarTwin will make decisions based on thorough analysis and evidence, weighing multiple perspectives.
Your FarTwin will make decisions by trusting their instincts and intuition, often relying on emotions and personal experiences.

dimensions.label: Problem Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will tackle problems in a step-by-step, linear fashion, breaking them down into manageable parts.
Your FarTwin will consider the entire problem context and work towards finding a comprehensive solution that addresses all aspects.

dimensions.label: Time Management Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will create detailed schedules and to-do lists, ensuring everything is completed on time.
Your FarTwin will prioritize tasks based on their current mood and energy levels, often taking a more flexible approach to time management.

dimensions.label: Learning Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin learn new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn by analyzing data, identifying patterns, and drawing conclusions based on evidence.
Your FarTwin will learn through hands-on experience, experimentation, and observation, often relying on intuition to fill gaps in knowledge.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be confident and assertive in social situations, actively seeking out new connections and experiences.
Your FarTwin will prefer smaller, more low-key social gatherings, often recharging by spending time alone.

dimensions.label: Note Taking Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin organize and review notes?

options.description: Your FarTwin will create comprehensive, annotated notes, often spending a significant amount of time reviewing and refining their work.
Your FarTwin will keep notes concise and to the point, focusing on capturing key ideas rather than elaborate details.

dimensions.label: Writing Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express themselves in writing?

options.description: Your FarTwin will write clearly and efficiently, getting straight to the point without unnecessary embellishments.
Your FarTwin will focus on storytelling, using vivid language and anecdotes to convey their message.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express themselves creatively?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach creative projects with a logical, analytical mindset, often seeking to understand the underlying mechanics and principles.
Your FarTwin will rely on their instincts and emotions to guide their creative process, often allowing themselves to explore new ideas without overthinking or critique.
